q1_general_response: {"answer": "Based on the image, this could be a seborrheic keratosis or a melanocytic nevus (mole). Atypical or dysplastic nevus should also be considered due to the irregular appearance. "}
q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "The lesion exhibits a relatively uniform brown color across its surface. The border appears to be well-defined and somewhat regular in shape. It is not possible to determine the tactile feel from the image. These observations, particularly regarding border regularity, color uniformity, and size, are important when assessing suspicious lesions. Further evaluation would involve dermoscopy to look for more subtle features, and potential biopsy if concerning characteristics are identified."}
